charges.charge_disposition: Plea of guilty to Counts 1-7 of the superseding information. $700 special assessment. Imprisonment for 30 months as to each count, to run concurrently. Court recommends minimum security facility and Boot Camp. Deft to self-report on 1/23/98. Three years supervised release as to each count, to run concurrently. Restitution of $3, 771 to Calvary Bank and $13, 272 to Union Planters Bank; mental health treatment as directed by USPO; obtain GED, etc. (1s)
